pages.text: Were not My verses recited to you and did you not reject them
They will say, "Our Lord, our defiance overcame us, and we were led astray
Our Lord, get us out of here, and, if we go back to our evil ways, we would be unjust
He will say, "Remain despised where you are and do not speak to Me
Among My worshipers there were those who used to say, 'Our Lord, We have believed, so forgive us and have mercy on us, for You are the most Merciful
But you were so preoccupied with mocking them that you forgot about Me, while you were laughing at them
I have rewarded them this Day for their patient endurance - they are the successful
He said: "How many years were you on earth
They will say, "We were there a day or part of a day; ask those who keep track of it
He will say, "You stayed but a little, if only you had known
Did you think, then, that We created you in vain, or that you would not be returned to Us
How sublimely exalted is God, the Ultimate Sovereign, the Ultimate Truth; there is no deity except Him, Lord of the Noble Throne of His majesty
Whoever calls another deity besides God with no evidence for its existence, then his reckoning will be with his Lord. the unbelievers will never triumph
And, say, "My Lord, forgive and have mercy; and You are the most Merciful-to-all
